page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content:
Chesterfield offers many facilities for recreation. There are green parks in several areas of the town, the largest of which is the{Queen's Park near the town centre. This has a fine cricket pitch, a boating lake, a large covered swimming pool, running tracks and a bowling green.
There are two golf courses and a football ground. The{Chesterfield Town team were Division Four Champions in 1985.
Being very close to the{Derbyshire {Peak District,}there are opportunities for walking, caving, potholing, hang gliding. rock climbing and other outdoor activities.
Many people indulge in indoor pursuits such as clubs and societies.
